idCitation.resTitle: CAD To Feature Class with Attribute of Nearest Point (Samples)

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Generate a feature class from CAD objects and point features that are nearest to those CAD features. This tool has been deprecated. For more information, see An overview of the Samples toolbox.

tool.name: CADtoFeatureClasswithAttributeofNearestPoint
tool.displayname: CAD To Feature Class with Attribute of Nearest Point (Samples)
tool.summary: Generate a feature class from CAD objects and point features that are nearest to those CAD features. This tool has been deprecated. For more information, see An overview of the Samples toolbox.

pythonReference.para: The CAD file that will be converted to an ArcGIS feature class.

dialogReference.para: The CAD file that will be converted to an ArcGIS feature class.

pythonReference.para: The feature class that will be created from the input CAD file.

dialogReference.para: The feature class that will be created from the input CAD file.

pythonReference.para: The SQL query expression that will be used to select records.

dialogReference.para: The SQL query expression that will be used to select records.

pythonReference.para: The type of near point objects whose attributes are associated with the output features.

dialogReference.para: The type of near point objects whose attributes are associated with the output features.

pythonReference.para: The SQL query expression that will be used to select records from the Near feature class.

dialogReference.para: The SQL query expression that will be used to select records from the Near feature class.

pythonReference.para: The maximum distance used to attach the point or annotation attributes to output features.

dialogReference.para: The maximum distance used to attach the point or annotation attributes to output features.

pythonReference.para: The output feature class type that will be created.

dialogReference.para: The output feature class type that will be created.

bullet_item.para: The output feature class will include the attributes of the nearest points.
This tool can be useful in associating text, blocks, or cells and their attributes with lines, points, and polygons.
